description: It acts like the bean in the traditional fairytale Jack and the Beanstalk.

jp_name: びっくり箱ステッキ Bikkuribako Sutekki
description: Any type of boxes or containers touched by the Stick will become a Jack-in-the-Box containing scary monsters
appears_in: The Jack in the Box Stick

jp_name: 温泉ジャグジー Onsen Jagujī
description: The gadget can be attached to a bath tub. It is normally used to create Jacuzzis, but with Nobita's experiment, it can also produce a "food" Jacuzzi.
appears_in: Let's Take a Bath in a Delicious Hot Spring!

jp_name: 日本標準カレンダー Nippon Hyōjun Karendā
description: One should use the red sticker and paste it on the day the user wants to have the holiday. Then, write down what the holiday is called and the entire Japanese calendar will be changed to match that of the gadget. The entirety of Japan will then follow the new national day(s) on their calendars. For example, Nobita wrote "Nap Day" and all the people in Japan took a nap. One can revert its effect by taking off the sticker.

jp_name: なかまいりせんこう  naka mairi senkō
description: By pressing the button, a smoke will come out of the green tip. Walk around the target person/people with the smoke surrounding them at least once and you will be able to join their group.
